string.base: Migrating feature states from related applications
string.translation: Selitev stanj možnosti iz povezanih aplikacij
Odstranjujem registracijo aplikacij in komponent COM+
Poteka izdelava operacij skripta za dejanje:

string.base: Specify a network location for the server image of the product.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Podajte mesto v mreži za strežniško sliko izdelka.

string.base: Enter the network location or click Change to browse to a location. Click Install to create a server image of [ProductName] at the specified network location or click Cancel to exit the wizard.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Vnesite mrežno mesto ali kliknite Spremeni in poiščite nahajališče. S klikom na Namesti izdelate strežniško sliko [ProductName] na podanem mrežnem mestu ali kliknite Prekliči za izhod iz čarovnika.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will create a server image of [ProductName] at a specified network location. To continue, click Next.
Are you sure you want to cancel [ProductName] installation?
Select the program features you want installed.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Označite možnosti programa, ki jih želite namestiti.

string.base: Click on an icon in the list below to change how a feature is installed.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite spremeniti način namestitve možnosti, kliknite ikono v seznamu spodaj.

string.base: Multiline description of the currently selected item
Custom Setup allows you to selectively install program features.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Namestitev Po meri omogoča, da namestite le želene možnosti programa.

string.base: Will be installed on first use. (Available only if the feature supports this option.)
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Bo nameščen pri prvi uporabi. (Na voljo samo, če ta možnost to omogoča.)

string.base: This install state means the feature...
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}To stanje namestitve pomeni, da bo možnost...

string.base: Will be completely installed to the local hard drive.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Bo v celoti nameščena na lokalni pogon.

string.base: The icon next to the feature name indicates the install state of the feature. Click the icon to drop down the install state menu for each feature.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Ikona ob možnosti kaže na namestitveno stanje možnosti. Kliknite ikono za prikaz spustnega menija Namestitveno stanje za vsako možnost.

string.base: Will be installed to run from the network. (Available only if the feature supports this option.)
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Bo nameščen za izvajanje iz omrežja. (Na voljo samo, če ta možnost to omogoča.)

string.base: Will have some subfeatures installed to the local hard drive. (Available only if the feature has subfeatures.)
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Bo na lokalni pogon namestila nekaj komponent možnosti. (Na voljo samo, če ta možnost to omogoča.)

string.base: Click Next to install to this folder, or click Change to install to a different folder.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Kliknite Naprej za namestitev v to mapo ali Spremeni za namestitev v drugo mapo.

string.base: The disk space required for the installation of the selected features.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Zahtevan prostor na disku za namestitev izbranih možnosti.

string.base: The highlighted volumes do not have enough disk space available for the currently selected features. You can remove files from the highlighted volumes, choose to install less features onto local drives, or select different destination drives.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Označeni diski nimajo dovolj razpoložljivega prostora za trenutno označene možnosti. Lahko odstranite datoteke iz označenih diskov, izberete namestitev manjšega števila možnosti na lokalne diske ali označite različne ciljne pogone.

string.base: Some files that need to be updated are currently in use.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Nekatere datoteke, ki jih je potrebno ažurirati, so trenutno v uporabi.

string.base: The following applications are using files that need to be updated by this setup. Close these applications and click Retry to continue.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Naslednje aplikacije uporabljajo datoteke, ki jih mora namestitev ažurirati. Zaprite te aplikacije in kliknite Poskusi znova za nadaljevanje.

string.base: WARNING: This program is protected by copyright law and international treaties.
string.translation: OPOZORILO : Ta program je zaščiten z zakonom o avtorskih pravicah in mednarodnimi sporazumi.

string.base: Setup will install [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
Please read the following license agreement carefully.
I &do not accept the terms in the license agreement
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}&Ne sprejemam pogojev in določil licenčne pogodbe.

string.base: I &accept the terms in the license agreement
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}&Da, sprejemam pogoje in določila licenčne pogodbe.

string.base: Modify, repair, or remove the program.
Change which program features are installed. This option displays the Custom Selection dialog in which you can change the way features are installed.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Spremeni seznam možnosti za namestitev. Ta možnost prikaže pogovorno okno Izbiranje po meri, na katerem lahko spremenite način, na katerega bodo nameščene možnosti programa.

string.base: Repair installation errors in the program. This option fixes missing or corrupt files, shortcuts, and registry entries.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Popravljanje namestitvenih napak v programu. Ta možnost popravi manjkajoče ali pokvarjene datoteke, bližnjice in postavke v registru.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will allow you to modify, repair, or remove [ProductName]. To continue, click Next.
Disk space required for the installation exceeds available disk space.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Zahtevan prostor za namestitev presega razpoložljivi prostor na disku.

string.base: The highlighted volumes do not have enough disk space available for the currently selected features. You can remove files from the highlighted volumes, choose to install less features onto local drives, or select different destination drives.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Označeni diski nimajo dovolj razpoložljivega prostora za trenutno označene možnosti. Lahko odstranite datoteke iz označenih diskov, izberete namestitev manjšega števila možnosti na lokalne diske ali označite različne ciljne pogone.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will install the Patch for [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Update.
The wizard is ready to begin installation.
Click Install to begin the installation.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite začeti z nameščanjem, kliknite Namesti.

string.base: If you want to review or change any of your installation settings, click Back. Click Cancel to exit the wizard.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite pregledati ali spremeniti nastavitve namestitve, kliknite Nazaj. Če želite zapustiti čarovnik, kliknite Prekliči.

string.base: You have chosen to remove the program from your system.
Click Remove to remove [ProductName] from your computer. After removal, this program will no longer be available for use.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite odstraniti [ProductName] iz računalnika, kliknite Odstrani. Po odstranitvi ta program ne bo več na voljo za uporabo.

string.base: If you want to review or change any settings, click Back.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite pregledati ali spremeniti nastavitve, kliknite Nazaj.

string.base: Your system has not been modified. To complete installation at another time, please run setup again.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Sistem ni bil spremenjen. Če želite namestitev končati kdaj drugič, takrat znova zaženite namestitev.

string.base: Click Finish to exit the wizard.
You can either keep any existing installed elements on your system to continue this installation at a later time or you can restore your system to its original state prior to the installation.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Že nameščene možnosti lahko obdržite na svojem sistemu in namestitev nadaljujete kasneje, ali pa obnovite sistem v stanje pred začetkom nameščanja.

string.base: Click Restore or Continue Later to exit the wizard.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Za izhod iz čarovnika kliknite Obnovi ali Nadaljuj Kasneje.

string.base: The wizard was interrupted before [ProductName] could be completely installed.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Čarovnik je bil prekinjen preden se je [ProductName] lahko v celoti namestil.

string.base: The Setup Wizard has successfully installed [ProductName]. Click Finish to exit the wizard.
&Yes, check for program updates (Recommended) after the setup completes.
string.translation: &Da, po zaključku programa poiščite posodobitve programa (priporočljivo).

string.base: The Setup Wizard has successfully uninstalled [ProductName]. Click Finish to exit the wizard.
Some program files might have been updated since you purchased your copy of [ProductName].
string.translation: Po vašem nakupu kopije [ProductName] so se nekatere datoteke programa lahko že spremenile.

string.base: Your Internet connection can be used to make sure that you have the latest updates.
string.translation: S pomočjo vaše povezave z Internetom se lahko prepričate, ali imate zadnje posodobitve.

string.base: <error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here><error text goes here>
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}<tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake<tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake><tu pride tekst napake>

string.base: [ProductName] Setup is preparing the Setup Wizard which will guide you through the program setup process. Please wait.
Your system has not been modified. To install this program at a later time, please run the installation again.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Sistem ni bil spremenjen. Če želite program namestiti kasneje, prosim znova zaženite namestitev.

string.base: Click Finish to exit the wizard.
You can either keep any existing installed elements on your system to continue this installation at a later time or you can restore your system to its original state prior to the installation.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Že nameščene možnosti lahko obdržite na svojem sistemu in namestitev nadaljujete kasneje, ali pa obnovite sistem v stanje pred začetkom nameščanja.

string.base: Click Restore or Continue Later to exit the wizard.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Če želite zapustiti čarovnik, kliknite Obnovi ali Nadaljuj kasneje.

string.base: The wizard was interrupted before [ProductName] could be completely installed.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Čarovnik je bil prekinjen, preden se je [ProductName] lahko v celoti namestil.

string.base: The program features you selected are being installed.
Please wait while the Setup Wizard installs [ProductName]. This may take several minutes.
Please wait while the Setup Wizard uninstalls [ProductName]. This may take several minutes.
The program features you selected are being uninstalled.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Odstranjevanje možnosti programa, ki ste jih izbrali.

string.base: The Setup Wizard will complete the installation of [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
The Setup Wizard will complete the suspended installation of [ProductName] on your computer. To continue, click Next.
Choose the setup type that best suits your needs.
All program features will be installed. (Requires the most disk space.)
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Nameščene bodo vse možnosti programa (zahteva največ prostora na disku.)

string.base: Choose which program features you want installed and where they will be installed. Recommended for advanced users.
string.translation: {&Tahoma8}Izberite možnosti programa, ki jih želite namestiti, in kam jih želite namestiti. Ta možnost je za naprednejše uporabnike.
Dejanje se je končalo [Time]: [1]. Povratna vrednost [2].

string.base: Out of memory. Shut down other applications before retrying.
string.translation: Zmanjkalo je spomina. Zaprite vse ostale aplikacije in poskusite znova.
Namestitveni program se je predčasno zaključil.

string.base: Removing older versions of this application
Preparing to remove older versions of this application
string.translation: Pripravljam se na odstranitev stare različice te aplikacije...

string.base: Error reading from file: [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Napaka pri branju datoteke: [2]. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dostopna.

string.base: Cannot create the file [3]. A directory with this name already exists. Cancel the installation and try installing to a different location.
string.translation: Datoteke [3] ni mogoče izdelati. Mapa s tem imenom že obstaja. Prekličite namestitev in poizkusite z namestitvijo v drugo mapo.

string.base: The installer has insufficient privileges to access this directory: [2]. The installation cannot continue. Log on as an administrator or contact your system administrator.
string.translation: Namestitveni program nima ustreznih pooblastil za dostop do te mape: [2]. Namestitev se ne more nadaljevati. Prijavite se kot skrbnik in poskusite ponoviti namestitev.

string.base: Error writing to file [2]. Verify that you have access to that directory.
string.translation: Napaka pri pisanju v datoteko [2]. Preverite, ali imate dostop do te mape.

string.base: Error reading from file [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Napaka pri branju iz datoteke [2]. Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dosegljiva.

string.base: Another application has exclusive access to the file [2]. Please shut down all other applications, then click Retry.
string.translation: Druga aplikacija ima izključni dostop do datoteke [2]. Zaprite vse ostale aplikacije in kliknite Poskusi znova.

string.base: There is not enough disk space to install the file [2]. Free some disk space and click Retry, or click Cancel to exit.
string.translation: Ni dovolj prostora na disku za namestitev te datoteke [2]. Sprostite nekaj prostora na disku in kliknite Poskusi znova ali kliknite Prekliči za izhod.

string.base: Source file not found: [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Ne najdem izvorne datoteke: [2]. Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dostopna.

string.base: Error reading from file: [3]. {{ System error [2].}} Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Napaka pri branju iz datoteke: [3]. {{ Sistemska napaka [2].}} Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dostopna.

string.base: Error writing to file: [3]. {{ System error [2].}} Verify that you have access to that directory.
string.translation: Napaka pri pisanju v datoteko: [3]. {{ Sistemska napaka [2].}} Preverite, ali imate dostop do te mape.

string.base: Source file not found{{(cabinet)}}: [2]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Ne najdem izvorne datoteke{{(paket cab)}}: [2]. Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dostopna.

string.base: Cannot create the directory [2]. A file with this name already exists. Please rename or remove the file and click Retry, or click Cancel to exit.
string.translation: Ne morem izdelati mape [2]. Datoteka s tem imenom že obstaja. Preimenujte ali odstranite datoteko in kliknite Poskusi znova, ali kliknite Prekliči za izhod.

string.base: The volume [2] is currently unavailable. Please select another.
string.translation: Pogon [2] trenutno ni na voljo. Izberite drug pogon.
Podana pot [2] trenutno ni na voljo.

string.base: Unable to write to the specified folder [2].
string.translation: Ne morem pisati v podano mapo [2].

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to read from the file [2]
string.translation: Pri branju iz datoteke [2] je prišlo do napake omrežja

string.base: An error occurred while attempting to create the directory [2]
string.translation: Pri izdelavi mape [2] je prišlo do napake.

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to create the directory [2]
string.translation: Pri izdelavi mape [2] je prišlo do napake omrežja

string.base: A network error occurred while attempting to open the source file cabinet [2].
string.translation: Pri odpiranju izvorne stisnjene datoteke je prišlo do napake [2].

string.base: The specified path is too long [2].
The Installer has insufficient privileges to modify the file [2].
string.translation: Namestitveni program nima ustreznih pooblastil za spreminjanje datoteke [2].

string.base: A portion of the path [2] exceeds the length allowed by the system.
string.translation: Del poti [2] presega dolžino, ki jo dovoljuje sistem.

string.base: The path [2] contains words that are not valid in folders.
string.translation: Pot [2] vsebuje besede, ki niso dovoljene v imenu mape.

string.base: The path [2] contains an invalid character.
[2] is not a valid short file name.

string.translation: Napaka pri pridobivanju varnosti datoteke: [3] GetLastError: [2]

string.base: Error applying patch to file [2]. It has probably been updated by other means, and can no longer be modified by this patch. For more information contact your patch vendor. {{System Error: [3]}}
string.translation: Napaka pri uveljavljanju popravka za datoteko [2]. Najbrž je že bila ažurirana na drug način in ne zahteva dodatnega popravljanja. Če želite dodatne informacije, pokličite dobavitelja popravka. {{Sistemska napaka: [3]}}

string.base: Could not create key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ključa [2] ni bilo mogoče izdelati. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not open key: [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ne morem odpreti ključa: [2]. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not delete value [2] from key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ne morem zbrisati vrednosti [2] iz ključa [3]. {{ Sistemska napaka [4].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not delete key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ne morem zbrisati ključa [2]. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not read value [2] from key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ne morem prebrati vrednosti [2] iz ključa [3]. {{ Sistemska napaka [4].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not write value [2] to key [3]. {{ System error [4].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Ne morem zapisati vrednosti [2] v ključ [3]. {{ Sistemska napaka [4].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not get value names for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Imen vrednosti za ključ [2] ni bilo mogoče naložiti. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not get sub key names for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Imen podključev za ključ [2] ni bilo mogoče naložiti. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not read security information for key [2]. {{ System error [3].}} Verify that you have sufficient access to that key, or contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Informacij o zaščiti za ključ [2] ni bilo mogoče naložiti. {{ Sistemska napaka [3].}} Preverite, ali imate ustrezen dostop do tega ključa, ali pokličite osebje podpore.

string.base: Could not increase the available registry space. [2] KB of free registry space is required for the installation of this application.
string.translation: Razpoložljivega prostora registra ni bilo mogoče povečati. [2] KB prostega prostora registra je potrebno za namestitev tega izdelka.

string.base: Another installation is in progress. You must complete that installation before continuing this one.
string.translation: Izvaja se že druga namestitev. Pred nadaljevanjem namestitve morate dokončati prvo namestitev.

string.base: Error accessing secured data. Please make sure the Windows Installer is configured properly and try the installation again.
string.translation: Napaka pri dostopanju do zaščitenih podatkov. Zagotovite, da je namestitveni program Windows pravilno konfiguriran, in poskusite ponoviti namestitev.

string.base: User [2] has previously initiated an installation for product [3]. That user will need to run that installation again before using that product. Your current installation will now continue.
string.translation: Uporabnik [2] je predhodno pognal namestitev za izdelek [3]. Uporabnik mora pred uporabo izdelka ponovno zagnati namestitev. Trenutna namestitev se bo sedaj nadaljevala.

string.base: User [2] has previously initiated an installation for product [3]. That user will need to run that installation again before using that product.
string.translation: Uporabnik [2] je predhodno pognal namestitev za izdelek [3]. Uporabnik mora pred uporabo izdelka ponovno zagnati namestitev.

string.base: Out of disk space -- Volume: '[2]'; required space: [3] KB; available space: [4] KB. Free some disk space and retry.
string.translation: Zmanjkalo je prostora na disku -- Pogon: '[2]'; zahtevan prostor: [3] KB; razpoložljivo: [4] KB. Sprostite nekaj prostora na disku in poskusite znova.

string.base: Are you sure you want to cancel?
string.translation: Ste prepričani, da želite preklicati namestitev?

string.base: The file [2][3] is being held in use{ by the following process: Name: [4], ID: [5], Window Title: [6]}. Close that application and retry.
string.translation: Datoteko [2][3] je zadržal v uporabi { naslednji proces: Ime: [4], ID: [5], Ime okna: [6]}. Zaprite aplikacijo in poskusite znova.

string.base: The product [2] is already installed, preventing the installation of this product. The two products are incompatible.
string.translation: Izdelek [2] je že nameščen in preprečuje namestitev tega izdelka. Oba izdelka nista združljiva.

string.base: Out of disk space -- Volume: [2]; required space: [3] KB; available space: [4] KB. If rollback is disabled, enough space is available. Click Cancel to quit, Retry to check available disk space again, or Ignore to continue without rollback.
string.translation: Zmanjkalo je prostora na disku -- Pogon: [2]; zahtevan prostor: [3] KB; razpoložljivo: [4] KB. Če je obnovitev v predhodno stanje onemogočeno, je prostora dovolj. Kliknite Prekliči za izhod, Poskusi znova za ponovno preverjanje prostega prostora ali Prezri za nadaljevanje brez povrnitve v predhodno stanje.
Dostop do omrežnega mesta [2] ni mogoč.

string.base: The following applications should be closed before continuing the installation:
string.translation: Pred nadaljevanjem namestitve zaprite naslednje aplikacije:

string.base: Could not find any previously installed compliant products on the machine for installing this product.
string.translation: Ne tem računalniku predhodno niso bili nameščeni skladni programi za namestitev tega izdelka.

string.base: The key [2] is not valid. Verify that you entered the correct key.
string.translation: Ključ [2] ni veljaven. Preverite, ali ste vnesli pravilen ključ.

string.base: The installer must restart your system before configuration of [2] can continue. Click Yes to restart now or No if you plan to restart later.
string.translation: Preden se lahko nastavitev [2] nadaljuje, mora namestitveni program znova zagnati vaš sistem. Kliknite Da za ponovni zagon ali Ne, če boste računalnik sami znova pognali kasneje.

string.base: You must restart your system for the configuration changes made to [2] to take effect. Click Yes to restart now or No if you plan to restart later.
string.translation: Da bi spremembe, opravljene za [2], stopile v veljavo, morate sistem znova zagnati. Kliknite Da za ponovni zagon ali Ne, če boste računalnik sami znova pognali kasneje.

string.base: An installation for [2] is currently suspended. You must undo the changes made by that installation to continue. Do you want to undo those changes?
string.translation: Namestitev [2] je trenutno odložena. Če želite nadaljevati, morate razveljaviti spremembe, ki jih je izvedla ta namestitev. Ali želite razveljaviti te spremembe?

string.base: A previous installation for this product is in progress. You must undo the changes made by that installation to continue. Do you want to undo those changes?
string.translation: Poteka predhodna namestitev tega izdelka. Če želite nadaljevati, morate razveljative spremembe, ki jih je izvedla ta namestitev. Ali želite razveljaviti spremembe?

string.base: No valid source could be found for product [2]. The Windows Installer cannot continue.
string.translation: Ni veljavnega vira za izdelek [2]. Namestitveni program sistema Windows ne more nadaljevati.

string.base: You may either restore your computer to its previous state or continue the installation later. Would you like to restore?
string.translation: Povrnite računalnik v stanje pred namestitvijo ali pa nadaljujte z namestitvijo kasneje. Ali želite povrniti računalnik v prejšnje stanje?

string.base: An error occurred while writing installation information to disk. Check to make sure enough disk space is available, and click Retry, or Cancel to end the installation.
string.translation: Med zapisovanjem podatkov namestitve na disk je prišlo do napake. Preverite, če je na voljo zadosti prostora, in kliknite Poskusi znova, ali pa kliknite Prekliči za izhod iz namestitve.

string.base: One or more of the files required to restore your computer to its previous state could not be found. Restoration will not be possible.
string.translation: Ene ali več datotek, potrebnih za povrnitev računalnika v prejšnje stanje, ni bilo mogoče najti. Povrnitev ne bo mogoča.

string.base: [2] cannot install one of its required products. Contact your technical support group. {{System Error: [3].}}
string.translation: [2] ne more namestiti ene od zahtevanih možnosti. Obrnite se na osebje podpore {{Sistemska napaka: [3].}}

string.base: The older version of [2] cannot be removed. Contact your technical support group. {{System Error [3].}}
string.translation: Stare različice programa [2] ni bilo mogoče odstraniti. Obrnite se na skupino za podporo {{Sistemska napaka: [3].}}

string.base: The path [2] is not valid. Please specify a valid path.
string.translation: Pot [2] ni veljavna. Določite veljavno pot.

string.base: Out of memory. Shut down other applications before retrying.
string.translation: Zmanjkalo je pomnilnika. Zaprite ostale aplikacije in poskusite znova.

string.base: There is no disk in drive [2]. Please insert one and click Retry, or click Cancel to go back to the previously selected volume.
string.translation: V pogonu [2] ni diska. Vstavite disk in kliknite Poskusi znova ali kliknite Prekliči za vrnitev na predhodno označen pogon.

string.base: There is no disk in drive [2]. Please insert one and click Retry, or click Cancel to return to the browse dialog and select a different volume.
string.translation: V pogonu [2] ni diska. Prosim, vstavite disk in kliknite Poskusi znova, ali kliknite Prekliči in označite drug pogon.

string.base: The folder [2] does not exist. Please enter a path to an existing folder.
string.translation: Mapa [2] ne obstaja. Vnesite pot do obstoječe mape.

string.base: You have insufficient privileges to read this folder.
string.translation: Nimate ustreznih pooblastil za branje te mape.

string.base: A valid destination folder for the installation could not be determined.
string.translation: Veljavne ciljne mape za namestitev ni bilo mogoče določiti.

string.base: Error attempting to read from the source installation database: [2].
string.translation: Napaka pri branju izvorne namestitvene baze podatkov: [2].

string.base: Scheduling reboot operation: Renaming file [2] to [3]. Must reboot to complete operation.
string.translation: Načrtovanje ponovnega zagona: Preimenujem datoteko [2] v [3]. Postopek zahteva vnovičen zagon računalnika.

string.base: Scheduling reboot operation: Deleting file [2]. Must reboot to complete operation.
string.translation: Načrtovanje ponovnega zagona: Brisanje datoteko [2]. Postopek zahteva vnovičen zagon računalnika.

string.base: Module [2] failed to register. HRESULT [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Registracija modula [2] ni uspela. HRESULT [3]. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Module [2] failed to unregister. HRESULT [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Razveljavitev registracije modula [2] ni uspela. HRESULT [3]. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Failed to cache package [2]. Error: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Predpomnjenje paketa [2] ni uspelo. Napaka: [3]. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Could not register font [2]. Verify that you have sufficient permissions to install fonts, and that the system supports this font.
string.translation: Pisave [2] ni bilo mogoče registrirati. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za nameščanje pisav in ali sistem podpira to pisavo.

string.base: Could not unregister font [2]. Verify that you have sufficient permissions to remove fonts.
string.translation: Registracije pisave [2] ni bilo mogoče razveljaviti. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za odstranjevanje pisav.

string.base: Could not create shortcut [2]. Verify that the destination folder exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Bližnjice [2] ni bilo mogoče izdelati. Preverite, ali ciljna mapa obstaja in ali imate dostop do nje.

string.base: Could not remove shortcut [2]. Verify that the shortcut file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Bližnjice [2] ni bilo mogoče odstraniti. Preverite, ali datoteka bližnjice obstaja in ali je dosegljiva.

string.base: Could not register type library for file [2]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Registracija tipske knjižnice za datoteko [2] ni uspela. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Could not unregister type library for file [2]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Registracija tipske knjižnice za datoteko [2] ni uspela. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Could not update the INI file [2][3]. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Ažuriranje datoteke INI [2][3] ni uspelo. Preverite, ali datoteka obstaja in ali je dosegljiva.

string.base: Could not schedule file [2] to replace file [3] on reboot. Verify that you have write permissions to file [3].
string.translation: Načrtovanje datoteke [2] za zamenjavo datoteke [3] pri ponovnem zagonu ni uspelo. Zagotovite, da imate dovoljenje za pisanje v datoteko [3].

string.base: Error removing ODBC driver manager, ODBC error [2]: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Odstranjevanje upravitelja gonilnikov ODBC ni uspelo, napaka ODBC [2]: [3]. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Error installing ODBC driver manager, ODBC error [2]: [3]. Contact your support personnel.
string.translation: Namestitev upravitelja gonilnikov ODBC ni uspela, napaka ODBC [2]: [3]. Obrnite se na podporo.

string.base: Error removing ODBC driver [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to remove ODBC drivers.
string.translation: Odstranjevanje gonilnika ODBC [4] ni uspelo, napaka ODBC [2]: [3]. Zagotovite, da imate ustrezna pooblastila za odstranjevanje gonilnikov ODBC.

string.base: Error installing ODBC driver [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that the file [4] exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Namestitev gonilnika ODBC [4] ni uspela, napaka ODBC [2]: [3]. Preverite, ali datoteka [4] obstaja in ali je dosegljiva.

string.base: Error configuring ODBC data source [4], ODBC error [2]: [3]. Verify that the file [4] exists and that you can access it.
string.translation: Napaka pri konfiguriranju vira podatkov [4], napaka ODBC [2]: [3]. Preverite, ali datoteka [4] obstaja in ali je dosegljiva.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) failed to start. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to start system services.
string.translation: Storitve [2] ([3]) ni bilo mogoče zagnati. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za zaganjanje sistemskih storitev.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be stopped. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to stop system services.
string.translation: Storitve [2] ([3]) ni bilo mogoče zaustaviti. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za zaustavitev sistemskih storitev.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be deleted. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to remove system services.
string.translation: Storitve [2] ([3]) ni bilo mogoče izbrisati. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za odstranjevanje sistemskih storitev.

string.base: Service [2] ([3]) could not be installed. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to install system services.
string.translation: Storitve [2] ([3]) ni bilo mogoče namestiti. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za namestitev sistemskih storitev.

string.base: Could not update environment variable [2]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to modify environment variables.
string.translation: Ažuriranje spremenljivke okolja [2] ni uspelo. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za spreminjanje spremenljivk okolja.

string.base: You do not have sufficient privileges to complete this installation for all users of the machine. Log on as an administrator and then retry this installation.
string.translation: Nimate ustreznega pooblastila za zaključitev namestitve za vse uporabnike računalnika. Prijavite se kot skrbnik in poizkusite ponoviti namestitev.

string.base: Could not set file security for file [3]. Error: [2]. Verify that you have sufficient privileges to modify the security permissions for this file.
string.translation: Nastavitev zaščite datotek za datoteko [3] ni uspela. Napaka: [2]. Preverite, ali imate ustrezna pooblastila za spreminjanje nastavitev zaščite za to datoteko.

string.base: Component Services (COM+ 1.0) are not installed on this computer. This installation requires Component Services in order to complete successfully. Component Services are available on Windows 2000.
string.translation: Na ta računalnik niso nameščene storitve komponent (COM+ 1.0). Namestitev zahteva Storitve komponent za uspešno zaključitev. Storitve komponent so na voljo v Windows 2000.

string.base: Error registering COM+ application. Contact your support personnel for more information.
string.translation: Napaka pri prijavljanju aplikacije COM+. Če želite podrobnejše informacije, se obrnite se na osebje podpore.

string.base: Error unregistering COM+ application. Contact your support personnel for more information.
string.translation: Napaka pri odstranjevanju registracije aplikacije COM+. Če želite podrobnejše informacije, se obrnite se na osebje podpore.

string.base: The description for service '[2]' ([3]) could not be changed.
string.translation: Opisa storitve '[2]' ([3]) ni bilo mogoče spremeniti.

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update the system file [2] because the file is protected by Windows. You may need to update your operating system for this program to work correctly. {{Package version: [3], OS Protected version: [4]}}
string.translation: Storitev za namestitev sistema Windows ne more posodobiti sistemske datoteke [2], ker to datoteko ščiti Windows. Mogoče bo potrebno ažurirati operacijski sistem, da bo ta program deloval pravilno. {{Različica paketa: [3], Različica zaščite OS: [4]}}

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update the protected Windows file [2]. {{Package version: [3], OS Protected version: [4], SFP Error: [5]}}
string.translation: Storitev za namestitev sistema Windows ne more posodobiti zaščitene datoteke Windows [2]. {{Različica paketa: [3], Različica zaščite OS: [4], Napaka SFP: [5]}}

string.base: The Windows Installer service cannot update one or more protected Windows files. SFP Error: [2]. List of protected files: [3]
string.translation: Storitev Namestitvenega programa za Windows ne more posodobiti ene ali več zaščitenih Windows datotek. SFP napaka: [2]. Seznam zaščitenih datotek: [3]

string.base: User installations are disabled via policy on the machine.
string.translation: Uporabniške namestitve so onemogočene s pravicami na računalniku.

string.base: This feature will not be available.
string.translation: Ta možnost ne bo na voljo.

string.base: This feature will be installed when required.
This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed to run from the CD.
string.translation: Možnost in vse njene komponente bodo nameščene za zagon z zgoščenke.

string.base: This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed on local hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost in vse njene komponente bodo nameščene za zagon z lokalnega trdega diska.

string.base: This feature, and all subfeatures, will be installed to run from the network.
string.translation: Možnost in vse njene komponente bodo nameščene za zagon iz omrežja.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from CD.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo nameščena za zagon z zgoščenke.

string.base: This feature will be installed on local hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost bo nameščena na lokalni trdi disk.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from network.
string.translation: Možnost bo nameščena za zagon iz omrežja.

string.base: This feature will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo nameščena po potrebi.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from CD.
string.translation: Možnost bo nameščena za zagon z zgoščenke.

string.base: This feature will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo nameščena na lokalni trdi disk.

string.base: This feature will be installed to run from the network.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo nameščena za zagon iz omrežja.
Ta možnost ne bo več dosegljiva.

string.base: This feature will be available to run from CD.
string.translation: Ta možnost se bo izvajala z zgoščenke.

string.base: This feature will be installed on your local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo nameščena na lokalni trdi disk.

string.base: This feature will be available to run from the network.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo na voljo za izvajanje iz omrežja.

string.base: This feature will be uninstalled completely, and you won't be able to run it from CD.
string.translation: Ta možnost bo v celoti odstranjena, zato izvajanje z zgoščenke ne bo mogoče.

string.base: This feature was run from the CD but will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Ta možnost je bila zagnana z zgoščenke, vendar bo nastavljena za namestitev po potrebi.

string.base: This feature will continue to be run from the CD
string.translation: Ta možnost se bo še naprej izvajala z zgoščenke

string.base: This feature was run from the CD but will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost je bila zagnana z zgoščenke, vendar bo nameščena na lokalni trdi disk.

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost sprosti [1] prostora na trdem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost zahteva [1] prostora na trdem disku.
Poteka izračunavanje stroškov za to možnost...

string.base: This feature will be completely removed.
This feature will be removed from your local hard drive but will be set to be installed when required.
string.translation: Možnost bo odstranjena z lokalnega trdega diska, vendar bo nastavljena za namestitev po potrebi.

string.base: This feature will be removed from your local hard drive but will still be available to run from CD.
string.translation: Možnost bo odstranjena z lokalnega trdega diska, vendar bo še vedno na voljo za izvajanje z zgoščenke.

string.base: This feature will remain on your local hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost bo ostala na lokalnem trdem disku.

string.base: This feature will be removed from your local hard drive, but will be still available to run from the network.
string.translation: Možnost bo odstranjena z lokalnega trdega diska, vendar bo še naprej na voljo za izvajanje iz omrežja.

string.base: This feature will be uninstalled completely, and you won't be able to run it from the network.
string.translation: Možnost bo v celoti odstranjena in izvajanje iz omrežja ne bo mogoče.

string.base: This feature was run from the network but will be installed when required.
string.translation: Možnost je bila zagnana iz omrežja, vendar bo po potrebi nameščena.

string.base: This feature was run from the network but will be installed on the local hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost je bila zagnana iz omrežja, vendar bo nameščena na lokalni trdi disk.

string.base: This feature will continue to be run from the network
string.translation: Možnost se bo še naprej izvajala iz omrežja

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures free up [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost sprosti [1] prostora na trdem disku. Zanjo je izbranih [2] od [3] komponent. Komponente sprostijo [4] prostora na trdem disku.

string.base: This feature frees up [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures require [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Možnost sprosti [1] prostora na trdem disku. Zanjo je izbranih [2] od [3] komponent. Komponente zahtevajo [4] prostora na trdem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures free up [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost zahteva [1] prostora na trdem disku. Zanjo je izbranih [2] od [3] komponent. Komponente sprostijo [4] prostora na trdem disku.

string.base: This feature requires [1] on your hard drive. It has [2] of [3] subfeatures selected. The subfeatures require [4] on your hard drive.
string.translation: Ta možnost zahteva [1] prostora na trdem disku. Zanjo je izbranih [2] od [3] komponent. Komponente zahtevajo [4] prostora na trdem disku.
